cast.overview: Years after his father disowns his adopted brother for marrying a woman of lower social standing, a young man goes on a mission to reunite his family.
cast.title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham

details.biography: Sushma Seth (born 20 June 1936) is an Indian  stage, film and television actress. She started her career in the  1950s, and was a founder member of the Delhi-based theatre group Yatrik.  Her first movie was Junoon  in 1978. She is known for playing the mother and the grandmother in  movies and television, and is best remembered for her role of Dadi in  the pioneering TV soap Hum Log (1984–1985).She has worked with famous directors like Dev Raj Ankur, Ram Gopal Bajaj, Manish Joshi Bismil, Chander Shekhar Sharma
details.name: Sushma Seth
